original_text: But he is not here. He has become alive again. That is what he said would happen. Come here. You can see the place where he was lying.
korean_text: 그가 여기 계시지 않고 그가 말씀 하시던 대로 살아나셨느니라 와서 그가 누우셨던 곳을 보라

sentences.original_text: That is what he said would happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 일어날 것이라고 말씀하신 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You can see the place where he was lying.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 누워있던 장소를 볼 수 있습니다.
